ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: gear and spocket
ygData.msgSnippet: Kill Meldrath over and over and over again!  He s EVIL!!!!!  Kill all his mino buddies too, that ll increase all of your gnome factions (I think). Gazamel
ygData.messageBody:
Kill Meldrath over and over and over again! He's
EVIL!!!!! Kill all his mino buddies too, that'll
increase all of your gnome factions (I think).

Gazamel
Retired Tinker - Sol Ro
--- nico@... wrote:
> --- In EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com, "Funky T. Munky"
> <toking@q...> wrote:
> > The sprockets it refers to are simply called
> "sprockets" and are
> readily
> > avaliable from the vendors both at the mills and
> in overthere
>
> Heya,
>
> I'm thinking on working on my Firiona Vie faction,
> as I'll have to
> fuck that Venril Sathir (currently amiable), and
> because the prices
> there suck rock. Are there tinkering supplies there?
>
> Also, is there a way to raise merchant faction in
> Ak'Anon without
> lowering Dark Reflection? I'm down to apprehensive
> after just one
> clockwork killed in SolA ... duh!
>
> Tell me about a good quest!
>
> (Does killing Meldrath help?)
>
>
